CustomField.description: Optional shipping postal code for the item's ordered on the invoice line. If left blank, the value of this field will be updated with the value of the parent invoice's "Shipping Postal Code" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional shipping postal code for the item's ordered on the invoice line. If left blank, the value of this field will be updated with the value of the parent invoice's "Shipping Postal Code" field.
CustomField.label: Shipping Postal Code
